tagline: Finds, collects, cleans, and documents data from public sources and APIs with rigorous provenance tracking.
pros: Encyclopedic knowledge of public data sources across domains
Builds reproducible collection pipelines, not one-off downloads
Rigorous quality assessment and documentation for every dataset
Ethical and legal data collection practices
cons: Thoroughness can slow down time-sensitive requests
Focused on collection and cleaning, not analysis or visualization
May flag data limitations that complicate the narrative stakeholders want
